Actions.Name: Get PortfolioLink
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve the PortfolioLink associated with a portfolio in a Roadmap. This object contains information about the external project that this portfolio is linked to.

Actions.Name: Get RoadmapItemLinks for a Portfolio
Actions.Description: This operation is used to retrieve all the RoadmapItemLinks associated with a portfolio in a Roadmap. RoadmapItemLinks contain information about the external tasks that are imported in this portfolio.

Actions.Name: Update PortfolioLink
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update the PortfolioLink associated with a portfolio in a Roadmap.

Actions.Name: Update RoadmapItemLink
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update a RoadmapItemLink.
